long_description: If you're looking for one board that can handle it all, choose the K2 Turbo Dream snowboard. With all-terrain rocker, this board floats through pow, slashes the crud and lands every drop. All-Terrain rocker is designed for use all over the mountain; it allows effortless turning on hardpack but also provides ample float in softer snow and crud. Tweekend baseline profile features a flat base between your feet and a rockered tip for a great feel when sliding rails, landing jumps and carving powder. Directional twin shape provides plenty of overall float and control, offering a balanced ride that's equally versatile ridden regular or switch. Twin Hyper Progressive sidecut mellows out the transitions, leaving you with a predictable, all-around board; twin flex allows easy riding regular and switch. WH3 wood core with honeycomb technology and lightweight ICG 10 glass delivers amazing pop and super-smooth transitions. Harshmellow technology employs a thin layer of synthetic polymer to damp the vibrations experienced while riding at high speeds. Fiberglass laminated in directional layers adds torsional stiffness, improving edge hold and increasing stability during off-axis landings. Carbon webs near binding area maximize ollie pop and control in any situation; sintered base absorbs wax fast and retains it longer. .
short_description: If you're looking for one board that can handle it all, choose the K2 Turbo Dream snowboard. With all-terrain rocker, this board floats through pow, slashes the crud and lands every drop.
